name: FURRY Seduction
description:
This cozy Game is all about revealing secret parts of different Furry Girls. By playing Matches you will increase your Score and unlock new, breathtaking Images for your very own collection. Lean back and enjoy the mesmerizing atmosphere of FURRY Seduction composed of an alluring Soundtrack, relaxing Game-Concept and seducive Artworks. It's time to have a glance beneath the cards and into some naughty business.





Finding matching pairs of naughty sex-toys is the basic game mechanic. Each pair will reveal a new part of the hidden background image until you fully discovered it. Filled with variety and lots of planned future content, this game is going to sweeten your evenings.





  • Stunning High-Quality Artworks to unlock
  • More than 70 recorded Voice Lines
  • Community-inclusive content (near future)
